author: Sheena McGinley
title: Watch: Kate Hudson addresses those Nick Jonas rumours on live TV. It's not at all awkward
text:
Correction, it seems a bit uncomfortable for Zooey at times, and maybe it is for Kate too, but her face doesn't give anything away... her eyes, on the other hand, are definitely singing a certain Kelis lyric at What Happens Live host, Andy Cohen.
For those who can't view the video, a caller puts the following question to Hudson: "Is it true you're dating Nick Jonas?" After some laughter, Hudson responds, "I don't like addressing any kind of gossip... My agent has been my mystery man maybe 25 times. Honestly, you can't hug someone or talk to someone without it ending up being a thing."
Or enjoy a ride , or have some dinner, or any of the other stuff.
Kate Hudson & Nick Jonas Spotted On Romantic Weekend — Are They Hooking Up? http://t.co/JC9lyJAJhJ pic.twitter.com/MP628GcvpE
— People and Stars (@PeopleStarsNewz) September 28, 2015 > MORE: Pics: Nick Jonas expertly deflects question re his rumoured romance with Kate Hudson
